directions.step:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Peel onions, leaving roots intact; cut each onion into 6 wedges. Place onion wedges in an 11 x 7-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Combine vinegar and remaining ingredients in a small bowl; pour vinegar mixture over onion wedges, tossing gently to coat. Cover and bake at 450 degrees for 25 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 45 minutes or until tender. Yield: 6 servings (serving size 1 cup).
CALORIES 72 (33% from fat); FAT 2.6 g; PROTEIN 1.6g; CARB 11.8g; FIBER 2.5g: CHOL 0mg; IRON 0.7mg; SODIUM 102 mg; CALC 33 mg.
